comments.body:
Add test with 2 components, where only the second component's batch size is known:
```
lambda: dataset_ops.Dataset.zip(
  dataset_ops.Dataset.range(4).batch(2, drop_remainder=False),
  dataset_ops.Dataset.range(5).batch(2, drop_remainder=True))
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +142,146 @@       lambda: dataset_ops.Dataset.range(5).batch(2, drop_remainder=True).filter(lambda _: True).unbatch(),
       cardinality.UNKNOWN),
      ("Unbatch4", lambda: dataset_ops.Dataset.range(5).batch(2, drop_remainder=True).repeat().unbatch(),
       cardinality.INFINITE),
      ("Unbatch5",
